content: This PR by @Jujian Zhang is 4 digits long. What is the status of this PR? From what limited evidence I can gather (build logs don't seem to be stored for 3 months), I have reasons to believe that it actually compiled back in July 2025, but no more comments have been made, and it slowly drifted away from master (so now there is a merge conflict). Can we just get this merged?
It'll need to get back onto the queue before we can answer that

Kenny Lau said:

This PR by Jujian Zhang is 4 digits long. What is the status of this PR? From what limited evidence I can gather (build logs don't seem to be stored for 3 months), I have reasons to believe that it actually compiled back in July 2025, but no more comments have been made, and it slowly drifted away from master (so now there is a merge conflict). Can we just get this merged?

Jujian is gonna be working and fading away from academic lean (I’m guessing) but I’ll talk to him about it
I just mentioned this to Jujian and he says he'll resurrect it (it's currently not even fork-based so it will need to be re-opened)
@Jujian Zhang has mentioned to me in DMs for me to adopt the PR. I'll do that soon.
I think the homogeneous hull and core can be redefined to have better defeq
